about_the_game:
Will you Escape from Kyoto House?


This is an Escape Room experience that you can play solo or with up to 3 other friends.

You find yourself trapped in a Japanese-themed room. Solve puzzles, crack riddles and discover hidden secrets in your adventure to escape the house.

FAQ

How long is the game?
As a classic Escape Room experience it is intended to be played once. Crafty players can complete the game in 30 minutes, but the average time is around 50 minutes.

If this is a short game, what stops me from refunding after I finish it?
As a gamer you understand the work that goes into creating these experiences, and are in principle up for paying for ones that entertain you. We hope that after escaping from Kyoto House you’ll feel good about the price you paid.

Will there be more content?
We will soon release a 'Horror Mode' which remixes the puzzles and greatly increases the difficulty, adding some terrifying new mechanics (and perhaps some evil spirits...) to the game. This mode will be free for people who own the game.

If Escape from Kyoto House proves to be popular, we really hope to release more escape experiences in the near future.

Multiplayer co-op for up to 4 players

Spend an evening with your friends exploring the mysteries of the Kyoto House.

Discover the secrets of the Kyoto House

Mysteries, riddles and more await you.

Over 20 different characters to choose from

Pick from a big selection of characters.

Play now!

Grab some friends and Escape from Kyoto House!

name: Escape from Kyoto House

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+ (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3 / AMD FX series or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 / AMD equivalent with 2GB+ of Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+ (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 4650 / AMD FX-8320 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 970/AMD 390 or equivalent with 3GB+ of Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews:
“It’s a fun looking game that looks set to deliver a digital take on the escape room experience, and in these days of self isolation, it’s nice to be able to hang out in a room with some friends!”
AlphaBetaGamer

“Honestly if I were to go to this in real life I would have a blast. I think the experience is well worth the price even in a virtual format especially if you can find someone to go through it with.”
Steady Giveaways
short_description: Your party finds themselves trapped in a Japanese-themed room. Solve puzzles, crack riddles and discover hidden secrets in your adventure to Escape from Kyoto House!
